comments.body: According to the API docs, possible values here are 'allowed' and 'denied' for 'ad_storage': https://developers.google.com/gtagjs/reference/api#consent
No, it's not. It says `'granted' | 'denied'` in the [docs](https://developers.google.com/gtagjs/reference/api#consent).

Fixed the following points @rdalmas made : https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/pull/52148#issuecomment-819631093

> I've tried to specify for example a developer Id using gtag and I'm not able. Example would be this:
> gtag('set', 'developer_id', true)
